[Uamoru's Head](/uamorusHead/) (upon death) |body = Superb Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Leather Armor |feet = Bounding Boots |weapon1 = Aamiina's Legacy |weapon2 = Exceptional Spear (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Spear |internalname = CHA_Bounty_Wildrhymer |guid = a2f5ec3c-9e87-4dcf-b1b6-3955868ed90e }} '''Uamoru the Pretender''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Uamoru, a nature godlike and pretender to the Kahanga throne, is attempting to foster rebellion against the leadership of Neketaka. Someone has placed a generous bounty on Uamoru's head. He's been tracked to an island east of Magran's Teeth where he and his pet lion are likely to defend against fortune-seekers. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender](/bountyUamoruThePretender/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender](/bountyUamoruThePretender/): He is the target of the bounty.

[[Uamoru's Head]] (upon death) |body = Superb Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Leather Armor |feet = Bounding Boots |weapon1 = Aamiina's Legacy |weapon2 = Exceptional Spear (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Spear |internalname = CHA_Bounty_Wildrhymer |guid = a2f5ec3c-9e87-4dcf-b1b6-3955868ed90e }} '''Uamoru the Pretender''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== Uamoru, a nature godlike and pretender to the Kahanga throne, is attempting to foster rebellion against the leadership of Neketaka. Someone has placed a generous bounty on Uamoru's head. He's been tracked to an island east of Magran's Teeth where he and his pet lion are likely to defend against fortune-seekers. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender]]: He is the target of the bounty.
